nodes.excerpt: Google's AMP links are super annoying. Inconsistent, often broken pages, mangled, long links to share, more user tracking. Bleh. Amplosion on iOS 15 fixes this by automatically blocking AMP pages and redirecting to the normal version. And it's open source!
nodes.title: Amplosion - Automatically blocks/redirects Google AMP pages on iOS 15
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Connect you iPad to a monitor and turn it into a full desktop computer! ğŸ–¥

nodes.excerpt: The only no-code tool you need to build and publish professional mobile apps and websites. Find separate layout editors, but one shared custom CMS. Out-of-the-box features like Multilingual, Real-time Filters or Forms. Publish to your domain for 5â‚¬/YEAR!

nodes.excerpt: Find discovering new music hard? Jinx makes it easy It suggests songs based on what you are currently listening to, as well as your existing playlists in Apple Music. It also suggests daily curated playlists and includes a widget for quick access to your music
nodes.title: Jinx - Discover music just for your taste
nodes.author: Pawan Dixit

nodes.excerpt: Calliope represents the simplest way to create audio mixes and memos collections. A project allows recording and importing audio segments that can be trimmed and merged in a few taps.
nodes.title: Calliope - Record and edit audio clips
nodes.author: Sergio La Rosa

nodes.excerpt: Welcome to MEH camera ãƒ„ Snap a pic and replace any faces with any you have uploaded. It's fun and and not MEH ãƒ„
nodes.title: MEH camera - Deepfake any picture with your face
nodes.author: Damjanski

nodes.excerpt: This is the place to find out about new apps, and get inspired to build your own in SwiftUI! These apps are the best examples of what SwiftUI is capable, check them out by visiting the site today!
nodes.title: SwiftUI Apps - A collection of apps built in SwiftUI
nodes.author: Gary Tokman

nodes.excerpt: SideNotes is a Markdown-based note-taking app for quick notes. More elegant than sticky notes, more agile, and more unobtrusive than big text editors. It lives on the screen side and appears when you need it. Save text, colors, tasks, pictures, file shortcuts.
nodes.title: SideNotes 1.3 - Quick Notes on Screen Side
nodes.author: Marcin Krzywonos

nodes.excerpt: HeadSpinâ€™s AI-powered App Performance Report shares deep insights to help understand an appâ€™s performance. The Report determines how an application fares on crucial performance KPIs and user experience.
nodes.title: HeadSpin Performance Report - Deep insights to understand your app's performance
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Judo is a Mac app for building native mobile interfaces without code. It's also a platform for enabling server-driven UIâ€”an emerging technique used by companies like Airbnb, Spotify and Facebook.
nodes.title: Judo - No-code, server-driven UI for iOS and Android apps
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Keystroke Pro provides highly customizable keycap visualizations that enables your viewers to follow along with ease. Itâ€™s the perfect tool for screen sharers, meeting hosts, tutorial creators and presentersâ€”anyone who teaches or demonstrates software on a Mac
nodes.title: Keystroke Pro 2 - Visualize keystrokes on your Mac
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: With Lonely Walls, any business (coffee shops, restaurants, hotel lobbies, etc.) turns into an art venue. We connect local artists with businesses and help them create unique art exhibitions which are then accessible to collectors via our venue map.
nodes.title: Lonely Walls - The best new way to buy and sell visual artwork.
nodes.author: Charles Doyon

nodes.excerpt: Music Widget is a remote app for Apple Music on macOS. It's a take on the original iTunes Widget introduced with Dashboard in Mac OS X 'Tiger' back in 2005. Music Widget looks extra sharp on retina displays because most of its interface is drawn in code.
nodes.title: Music Widget for Apple Music on macOS - A take on the classic iTunes Widget
nodes.author: Mario Guzman

nodes.excerpt: Audio creators donâ€™t have a platform to share. That's why we've built Droplet. Droplet is an audio social media app where users can create and consume audio content in the form of 5-60 second sound bites, â€˜Dropsâ€™.
nodes.title: Droplet - Social media platform for 30 second sound bites
nodes.author: Droplet

nodes.excerpt: Relax with our vibrating app. Choose from a variety of phone vibration settings. Enjoy strong vibration for especially tense places and use it as a back massager or loosen up the rest of your body on the relaxing mode.
nodes.title: Massager - Vibration app to relax & enjoy
nodes.author: Arseny Kuheika

nodes.excerpt: AppLaunchpad is a Design tool to create stunning screenshots for App Store and Google Play. Feature highlight 1) Unlimited Layout & Device Frame color 2) Millions of Background Images powered by Unsplash 3) Localization 4) 100+ pre-built designer templates
nodes.title: AppLaunchpad 3.0 - Design beautiful images for App Store & Google Play pages

nodes.excerpt: Listen to you favorite tunes, on Apple Music or Spotify, with this web app that brings up the iPod nostalgia
nodes.title: iPod Classic - Classic iPod interface for Spotify or Apple music library

nodes.excerpt: FEED is the new social video app that makes idea-sharing more fun! Talk to anyone, anywhere, in real-time, & make collective movies. No more typing - FEEDâ€™s co-streaming function is the new way to chat & collaborate. Share your ideas; join a new feed today!
nodes.title: FEED - The first social network for co-streaming video content

nodes.excerpt: The monitoring app you all deserve! It's soon available in open Beta. And launch will be a few weeks after that. https://usage.pro
nodes.title: Usage for Mac - The most advanced and modern monitoring for your Mac!
nodes.author: Oleh

nodes.excerpt: Keep up with WWDC21. Quickly search, filter and favorite this year's sessions in Raycast. Use the WWDC app to download and watch all videos during the week or any time after. Built by Raycast in collaboration with wwdc.io.
nodes.title: WWDC21 by Raycast - Search, watch and download all WWDC21 sessions on your Mac

nodes.excerpt: Zing makes it easy to ask questions on the go from your database (PostgreSQL, with more to come) for free in just a few taps: * Ask questions * Search for data * Create visualizations and tables * Chat with your team..from wherever you are.

nodes.excerpt: It's not just an enlarger camera app for iPad, Halide for iPad is a whole new app â€” it sports an interface designed from scratch for iPad, some special features for iPad shooting, & it manages to also bring all of Halideâ€™s powerful features along for the ride.

nodes.excerpt: Simply point your iPhone or iPad to the Sky and get to know more about every object you can see. Check 120 000 stars, 1200 satellites tracked in real-time, constellations, Messier and Caldwell deep space objects, all Solar system and several meteor showers.
nodes.title: Space Era - AR star guide, night sky in your pocket

nodes.title: New iMac - New design in a spectrum of vibrant colors, plus M1 chip

nodes.excerpt: Congrats, you got the Covid-19 vaccine. Now save the record for free with VaxYes. In 3 easy steps you can get a secure, digital vaccine record that you can use for Travel, Live Shows, and Employers. Get your free, secure, verified digital vaccine card.
nodes.title: VaxYes - Free, secure, verified, digital vaccine card

nodes.excerpt: Test Lottie animations for mobile from the LottieFiles website, After Effects, or Adobe Animate plugins. Easily send animations as Lottie, GIF, or MP4 to your stakeholders. Access 1000s of Lottie animations anytime, anywhere, while on the go. And much more!

nodes.excerpt: Life is a magical journey; why not getting some souvenirs out of it? 1. Open the app. 2. Write down 3 things you are thankful for that day. 3. That's it! We are working on exciting features. Have fun with the innovative Souvenir gratitude tracker app!
nodes.title: Souvenir - A gratitude journal to track the good in your life

nodes.title: Waterful - Turn daily hydration into a fun habit

nodes.excerpt: They say don't judge a book by its cover... What about movies? uFlix takes movie nights and turns the decision process into an enjoyable social experience to have with friends, family or partners!
nodes.title: uFlix - Choose what to watch in a hassle free manner

nodes.excerpt: Hand Music is an easy to use music app which can be controlled by moving your palm to any block. Simply position your hand above a block to hear it play.

nodes.excerpt: Drink Map is a small app that helps you log the places in which you have drunk. By pressing the only real button available, "Raise the jug", you'll mark your location. Learn a new fact every time you use the app on the DID YOU KNOW? section!
nodes.title: Drink Map - Mark places where you have drunk

nodes.excerpt: Get yourself comfortable, turn your phone so the flashlight is facing you, close your eyes then fall effortlessly into an immersive journey through a kaleidoscope of colours created by your subconscious...

nodes.excerpt: Timedash combines your most vital daily information in one nifty widget: time, date, weather & a daily step counter, all available in one clear overview. Carefully designed with lots of attention to detail, Timedash is a must have widget for your Home Screen!
